itemDisplayName: Creates a Citrix XenApp / XenDesktop Services PoC environment on Azure with a new AD Forest
description: This template creates three new Azure VM's. It configures the first VM to be an AD DC for a new Forest and create a Citrix Cloud Connector VM and a Golden Master Image VM which are both domain joined.
summary: This template creates an Citrix XenApp / XenDesktop Services PoC with AD, Cloud Connector and Golden Master Server.
